org.uncertweb.api.gml.geometry
Class RectifiedGrid

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry
      org.uncertweb.api.gml.geometry.RectifiedGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable
public class RectifiedGrid
extends com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry

Rectified Grid of UncertWeb GML profile; extends JTS geometry; A RectifiedGrid is a grid for which there is an affine transformation between the grid coordinates and the coordinates of an external coordinate reference system. It contains several elements: -limits define the extent of the grid 1 1 5 5 -axis labels define the labels of the axis of the grid u v -origin defines a georeferenced point which is the origin for the affine transformation 52.77 7.82 -offset vectors describe the transformation from the grid to the georeferenced grid in consuming applications (e.g. for visualization on the earth's surface) -0.3 1.25 1.3 0.25

Author:
staschc
See Also:
